alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 04 at 7:43AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Water Levels and Ice Shove Possible Today through Monday afternoon... A series of storms moving north through the Bering Sea and into the Southern Chukchi Sea today and Monday will bring very strong south winds gusting as high as 75 mph today and tonight to outer coastal areas along with elevated water levels. The strong winds and elevated water levels may push ice inland around Hooper Bay, and from Nome to the Bering Strait. Water will be pushed up through cracks in the ice, and along the shoreline on south and west facing shorelines. Residents should move items well above the normal high tide line and off the ice to prevent loss. For the latest forecasts go to www.weather.gov/fairbanks.

area.areaDesc: Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta
